Class RefreshingFlask

java.lang.Object

game.items.RefreshingFlask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Consumable
public class RefreshingFlask
extends Item
implements Consumable
A class that represents an item which will be dropped when the enemy is defeated.

  • Method Details

    • consumedBy

      public java.lang.String consumedBy​(Actor actor)
      Each time the player uses it, their stamina will increase by 20% of their maximum stamina. It can only be consumed once by the player and cannot be consumed directly from the ground. They must be picked up by the player before being consumed.
      Specified by:
      consumedBy in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor who owns the HealingVial item
      Returns:
      a description of what happened (the result of the action being performed) that can be displayed to the user.

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor owner)
      List of allowable actions that the Refreshing Flask can perform to the current actor. The Player can perform ConsumeAction on RefreshingFlask.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      owner - the actor that owns the item
      Returns:
      a list of Actions for actor acts on the RefreshingFlask item
